TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi CryptoConfig extends System.Object

summary.span: Obtiene acceso a la información de configuración de criptografía.

span.span: Accesses the cryptography configuration information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La siguiente tabla muestra los nombres simples reconocidos por esta clase y las implementaciones de algoritmo predeterminadas a las que se asignan.The following table shows the simple names recognized by this class and the default algorithm implementations to which they map. Como alternativa, puede asignar otras implementaciones a estos nombres, como se describe en [asignación de nombres de algoritmo a clases de criptografía](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/map-algorithm-names-to-cryptography-classes.md).Alternatively, you can map other implementations to these names, as described in [Mapping Algorithm Names to Cryptography Classes](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/map-algorithm-names-to-cryptography-classes.md). |Nombre simpleSimple name|Implementación del algoritmoAlgorithm implementation| |-----------------|------------------------------| |3DES, Triple DES, TripleDES System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES3DES, Triple DES, TripleDES, System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES|| |AES, System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProviderAES, System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider|| |AesManaged, System.Security.Cryptography.AesManagedAesManaged, System.Security.Cryptography.AesManaged|| |System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithmSystem.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm|| |DES, System.Security.Cryptography.DESDES, System.Security.Cryptography.DES|| |DSA, System.Security.Cryptography.DSADSA, System.Security.Cryptography.DSA|| |ECDH, ECDiffieHellman, ECDiffieHellmanCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngECDH, ECDiffieHellman, ECDiffieHellmanCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng|| |ECDsa, ECDsaCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCngECDsa, ECDsaCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng|| |System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmSystem.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm|| |HMAC, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACHMAC, System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC|| |HMACMD5, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACMD5HMACMD5, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACMD5|| |HMACRIPEMD160, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACRIPEMD160HMACRIPEMD160, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACRIPEMD160|| |HMACSHA1, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1HMACSHA1, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1|| |HMACSHA256, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA256HMACSHA256, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA256|| |HMACSHA384, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA384HMACSHA384, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA384|| |HMACSHA512, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512HMACSHA512, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512|| |System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithmSystem.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm|| |MACTripleDES, System.Security.Cryptography.MACTripleDESMACTripleDES, System.Security.Cryptography.MACTripleDES|| |MD5, System.Security.Cryptography.MD5MD5, System.Security.Cryptography.MD5|| |System.Security.Cryptography.MD5CngSystem.Security.Cryptography.MD5Cng|| |RandomNumberGeneratorRandomNumberGenerator|| |RC2, System.Security.Cryptography.RC2RC2, System.Security.Cryptography.RC2|| |Rijndael, System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelRijndael, System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael|| |RIPEMD160, RIPEMD-160, System.Security.Cryptography.RIPEMD160ManagedRIPEMD160, RIPEMD-160, System.Security.Cryptography.RIPEMD160Managed|| |RSA, System.Security.Cryptography.RSARSA, System.Security.Cryptography.RSA|| |SHA, SHA1, System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1SHA, SHA1, System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1|| |System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1CngSystem.Security.Cryptography.SHA1Cng|| |SHA256, SHA-256, System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256SHA256, SHA-256, System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256|| param.name: algorithm
param.span: Algoritmo al que se va a realizar la asignación.

span.span: The algorithm to map to.

param.name: names
param.span: Matriz de los nombres que se van a asignar al algoritmo.

summary.span: Agrega un conjunto de nombres a las asignaciones de algoritmo que se van a utilizar para el dominio de aplicación actual.

span.span: Adds a set of names to algorithm mappings to be used for the current application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Las asignaciones especificadas tienen prioridad sobre las asignaciones integradas y las asignaciones en el archivo machine.config.The specified mappings take precedence over the built-in mappings and the mappings in the machine.config file. Las asignaciones se usan para evitar el código de confianza de parcialmente del uso de operaciones criptográficas de confianza.The mappings are used to prevent partially trust code from using trusted cryptographic operations.

span.span: The or parameter is .

exception.span: No se puede tener acceso a desde fuera del ensamblado.

span.span: cannot be accessed from outside the assembly.

span.span: One of the entries in the parameter is empty or .

permission.span: requiere plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: Este miembro no se puede usar código de confianza parcial o transparente.

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

Las asignaciones se usan para evitar el código de confianza de parcialmente del uso de operaciones criptográficas de confianza.The mappings are used to prevent partially trust code from using trusted cryptographic operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool AllowOnlyFipsAlgorithms { get; }
.property bool AllowOnlyFipsAlgorithms
Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllowOnlyFipsAlgorithms As Boolean
public: static property bool AllowOnlyFipsAlgorithms { bool get(); };
member this.AllowOnlyFipsAlgorithms : bool

summary.span: Indica si el runtime debe aplicar la directiva para crear solo algoritmos certificados conformes con el Estándar federal de procesamiento de información (FIPS).

span.span: Indicates whether the runtime should enforce the policy to create only Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) certified algorithms.

value.span: Es para aplicar la directiva; de lo contrario, es .

span.span: to enforce the policy; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si `false`, se puede crear cualquier algoritmo.If `false`, any algorithm may be created.

summary.span: Crea una nueva instancia del objeto criptográfico especificado.

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified cryptographic object.
